TEI.2.document_title: James W. Breedlove to Stephen F Austin, 08-04-1836

barker_notes.barker_summary: James W. Breedlove to B. T. Archer, New Orleans, August 4, 1836. Hoping that Austin will be elected president. (Omitted.)
